thread.title: BRIEF-Scripps Networks Interactive Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.50

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Scripps Networks Interactive Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.50
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Scripps Networks Interactive Inc:
* SCRIPPS NETWORKS INTERACTIVE REPORTS FULL YEAR AND FOURTH QUARTER 2017 OPERATING RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.50 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 7.6 PERCENT TO $956.1 MILLION * SCRIPPS NETWORKS INTERACTIVE - DUE TO PENDING MERGER WITH DISCOVERY COMMUNICATIONS, SCRIPPS NETWORKS INTERACTIVE WILL NOT ISSUE FULL YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE
* QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.38 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.18, REVENUE VIEW $916.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
